Desc.entry: A registered educational charity project for young people working closely with schools. Offers development training to 14-16 year olds at risk of exclusion from school or in danger of being involved in crime. Uses challenging outdoor activities as a tool for changing participants' behaviour. Also engages with 16-18 year olds who are not in college or work and offers volunteering opportunities which includes assisting with outdoor activities and residentials. Events include the Canoe Challenge in October. Company limited by guarantee no 1157897. Self or any referral.
